entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria (University of)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: University of Victoria 3:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: 0.5°C
Wind: NNE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few showers. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few showers ending late this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Windy. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Windy. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 21 February 2023
